      • createGroup

        public JSONObject createGroup(Notification notification,
                              java.lang.String body,
                              java.lang.String remoteAddress,
                              java.lang.String applicationName,
                              java.lang.String applicationVersion,
                              java.lang.String userAgent)
                       throws JSONException,
                              java.sql.SQLException,
                              DatabaseTypeException,
                              javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                              java.lang.NullPointerException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              javax.mail.MessagingException,
                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Create group
        Parameters:
        notification - Notification object
        body - Data sent by pusher
        remoteAddress - Remote address
        applicationName - Application version of the pusher
        applicationVersion - Application name of the pusher
        userAgent - User agent of the pusher
        Returns:
        JSONObject contains group creation information
        Throws:
        JSONException - if any JSON errors
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type is not found
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - if any invalid address
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any NULL pointer
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any illegal arguments
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if any errors occurred while send message
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
